data.text: Naama volo ná, niima wuyei ɠa loo Zuda yooi zu ga:
À siɠidaʋɛti daalao,
Zɔi é losu kpaan ná-faiti su,
À ɓɔɠɔ ɠaliva Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma yeenɔpɛ,
É naati zeini bu,
Kɔɠɔlomai woni da,
Telebo nui ná-pelei ɠa ga pelei sɔlegai gola.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gi ɠitogɛ è ʋa,
È wɔin ɠa ɗa ɠɛ mà kpidii laawu,
Kɛlɛ nu a ɠɛna faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui maawɔinɠa,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ziilɛigi veezu gi ʋɛ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gá-ƓALAGI,
Naati ti zaa, ti la mɔ yɛnvua ʋolu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è gá-nuɓusɛiti gaawɔɔlɔa,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gi ɠɛai ma kidaaʋiligi zu,
Gi ɠɛni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuʋɛ
Mazɔlɔɔ gi kogi zeɠeni, gi ɓɔlɔ,
Ɗa-wɔvɛiti ta zɛnvui wo ʋolu,
Nà-nuɓusɛiti, à lɛ wo-laazuʋɛ wa-ʋɛlɛi wu,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɠula zeizuʋɛ,
